message: I propose a 90/10 split. I think it's a fair start, given the inflation dynamic favors me more in later rounds.
I'm starting strong, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to respond!
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm reducing my share, but I think this is a fair compromise given the inflation impact.
I'm still holding firm, but willing to give you a bit more. Don't expect me to go much lower!
I'm willing to concede further, but I'm not going to give up all my share. Let's find a solution that benefits us both.
